column5: Twin River Villas, located within walking distance of Schlitterbahn, Prince Solms Tube Chute (Comal River), and minutes from historic Gruene, TX. The Rio offers fully furnished like-home accommodations. This 3 bedroom/2 bath villa is uniquely decorated and comes well stocked with full-kitchen amenities, washer and dryer, fine linens and Wifi capabilities.
column8: Family lodging near Schlitterbahn, Downtown, and the Comal...The Rio - TRV- The Rio
